title: The.Fall.of.The.Dungeon.Guardians.MULTi8-PROPHET
description:
The Fall of the Dungeon Guardians  (c) Mana Games

release date ...: August 2769
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/CZ/HU

The Fall of the Dungeon Guardians is an RPG Dungeon
Crawler game, in First  Person  View,  inspired  by
classics like Dungeon Master and Might & Magic, but
featuring a  modern  combat  system  based  on  the
triptych "tank/damage dealer/healer" mechanism.

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
The game is updated to v1.0e.
Language can be changed in the Options menu
